subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Édouard Roger-Vasselin, who is ranked 82nd in the world, feels at home when he plays at the French Open, partly because he lives so close to the grounds at Roland Garros.
snippet: Édouard Roger-Vasselin, who is ranked 82nd in the world, feels at home when he plays at the French Open, partly because he lives so close to the grounds at Roland Garros.
